{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = WRT3200ACM top.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = AC3200 MU-MIMO Gigabit Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-WRT3200ACM/ |sp = http://support.linksys.com/en-us/support/lbc/WRT3200ACM |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Linksys_WRT3200ACM |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Not Supported --> |gargoylesupport = Supported
|brand = Linksys |model = WRT3200AC |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = M |revision = v1 |subrevision = (rango) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/06/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Linksys_WRT3200ACM |wlclass = AC32002R |series = WRT |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-WRT3200ACM |icid = 3839A-WRT3200ACM |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 48SAM203.SGD |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6820;88F6820-A0 C180; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.6 / 1.8 / 2.0 GHz (1.33 GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML02G2; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = Serial(SPI) |fla2_num = 2 |fla2chip = Winbond;; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = DDR3 |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 256 |ram2chip = Micron;; |ram2_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6352; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = Yes |802.1qvlan = Yes |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 60:38:E0 |oui = 60:38:E0
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.10.70;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 / eSATA (combo port) |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header |jtag = yes,, 20-pad header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, AP3200, DFS, |addchip = 2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85309-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, Gargoyle, LEDE Project, McDebian, OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/21/2016 |estreldate = 05/18/2016 |estprice = 250 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833124634 |asin = B01JOXW3YE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B06Y5W188F |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8964;88W8964-BTW2; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Marvell;88W8964;88W8964-BTW2; |rad2chip2 = Marvell;88W8887;88W8887-NAA2; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = 2600 |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48SAM203.SGD" and "2016.05.18" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Linksys WRT32X|Wistron NeWeb}} *Linksys WRT3200ACM (Rango) FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-WRT3200ACM Q87-WRT3200ACM] {{FCC ST|01/31/2017|indexme.}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820-A0 C180 @1.8 GHz ([http://www.marvell.com/embedded-processors/armada-38x/ Armada 385]) *Flash: ''AMD / Spansion'' 256MB (NAND), RAM: 512MB (DDR3) *WLAN: 2x [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/wireless/avastar/88W8964/ 88W8964] 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac (MU-MIMO) ::: 1x [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/wireless/avastar/88W8887/ 88W8887] 1T1R 802.11ac, BT 4.2, NFC, FM rec *Switch: [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/switching/link-street/ 88E6352] (7-Port AVB GbE Switch, 5x GbE PHY) :Uses a 12V / 3A power adapter
==Links of Interest== *[https://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/gpl/WRT3200ACM_v1.0.6.186168_GPL.tar.gz Linksys GPL sources for the WRT3200ACM for firmware revision 1.0.6.186168] *[http://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/dofc/CE%20DoC%20WRT3200ACM.pdf DoC download]
===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series#wrt3200acm WRT3200ACM] - [[Marvell]] Armada 385 @1.8GHz (Rango) *[https://github.com/Chadster766/McDebian/wiki On the '''McDebian''' Wiki]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33030-linksys-wrt3200acm-ac3200-mu-mimo-gigabit-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''Linksys WRT3200ACM MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :• CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820-A0 C180 @1.8GHz (Armada 385 ARMv7) :• 2.4GHz Radio: [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/wireless/assets/Marvell_Avastar_88W8964_SoC-01_PB_v2.pdf 88W8964]-BTW2 WiSoC (MU-MIMO) ::4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85309-11 2.4GHz Front End Module ::Micron 128MB DDR3 RAM :• 5GHz Radio: [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/wireless/assets/Marvell_Avastar_88W8964_SoC-01_PB_v2.pdf 88W8964]-BTW2 WiSoC (MU-MIMO) ::[[Marvell]] 88W8887-NAA2 DFS monitor (WLAN/BT/NFC/FM) ::4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85728-11 5GHz Front End Module ::Micron 128MB DDR3 RAM :• Switch: [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/switching/link-street/ 88E6352] GbE Switch *[http://www.gadgetreview.com/linksys-wrt3200acm-mu-mimo-wireless-router-review Review ''Linksys WRT3200ACM'' on '''GadgetReview''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=304086&sid=5a0c57e12a2b937203c837943abee0b2 ''Linksys WRT3200ACM ??'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-wrt-3200acm-rumors-the-big-blue-router-hits-wave-2.34563/ ''Linksys WRT-3200ACM - The Big Blue Router Hits Wave 2'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-wrt3200acm-usb-to-ttl-connection.35393/ ''Linksys WRT3200ACM USB to TTL Connection'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[https://github.com/kaloz/mwlwifi/issues/152 ''Increased memory usage on WRT3200ACM'' on '''mwlwifi''']

Please insert instructions here
